input: i do feel slighted when some people use their piece of the cyber world to be rude towards me
i feel the precious metals sector will be starting something like this in the near futures and possibly it has already started as seen in the rising volume on the down days
i pulled myself off the blanket and bed was really feeling rather gloomy
i feel ever so ever so ever so jolly
i also know how good it feels to look back and see that i honored my word and that helps from the start
i remember how i used to feel watching tv and seeing sara rue on popular because she was an inspiration to me
i love it so much it adds just the right about of edge when im feeling rebellious
i am feeling discouraged it is
i tried to make a cheerful comment about fitting her in but i feel really unwelcome
i feel that uncertain should be a better communicator
im feeling quite adventurous and tried out those drinks that i just normally read through the pages of pocketbooks
i feeling handsome q where is this lyrics from oh when you look at me like that my darling what did you expect
i just feel too stubborn to give up on a dream
i am also now down lbs so i feel so good i still have another to go at least well thats the plan anyway
i feel overly burdened by even the smallest responsibility so the large responsibilities that i have recently agreed to are burrowing their way into my brain and tickling my subconscious at all hours
